subject: Re: Jillian Dinkel Website
preview: Closing this ticket since Help Scout generated a new ticket.

No worries at all—we’ve checked Flodesk, and that email is now on the list.

See the screenshot below for confirmation.

Hi Amy,

Hope you’re having a lovely Monday!

I’ve had a look with the team, and it turns out amy@bandit.com was already on the mailing list. That’s why it didn't flag as a new entry.

Would you mind giving it another go with a different email address?

Hey team,

The email is amy@bandit.com

Hi Amy,

Thanks for reaching out and flagging this concern with us.

We've passed the details to our dev team to investigate.

We'll loop back to you as soon as we have an update.

Hey team,
A little flag I just noticed on the internal location landing pages - the padding between scroll down, the feature text and the next panel is quite large compared to the live website.
I've attached some screenshots of 16inch examples and 27inch examples. Can you please tighten up the padding please around this section?
I've labelled the screenshots according to device and staging/live instance.

Let me know how you go.

Cheers,
Amy

Hi Amy,

We're happy to let you know we’ve sorted out these updates for you:
  • Mobile Menu Fix: 'Woolloomooloo' should sit correctly on the same line as NSW. (See the screenshot below)
  • Expressions of Interest Form: This has been updated across all the inner pages.

Please have a look and let us know if you're happy to give us the green light to go live.

Awesome, thank you. Please keep us in the loop.
We really want to get this all wrapped up - almost there :)

Invoice has been forwarded on to our accounts team.

Kindest,

Hi Amy,

We appreciate the quick confirmation.

I have forwarded the form update to the team and will send you an update within the day.

Regarding the other points:
  • Mobile Issue: This appears to be a caching error, but rest assured, we are investigating it now to confirm.
  • Invoice: The team has sent the invoice for the additional work.

Please feel free to reach out if you have any queries.

Thanks team!
The extra hour is approved.
The mobile menu looks good, except 'Woolloomooloo' still needs to drop down to the same line as NSW - see screenshot below. I'm on an iphone 15 pro max.

Hi Amy,

Just letting you know we’ve updated the mobile navigation. Have a look and let us know if that’s all working well on your end.

Regarding the Forms: The "Expression of Interest" form on the inner pages wasn't in the original Figma file or request, so our scope was limited to the main Enquire form.

However, we can definitely update the page template to use the new "Expression of Interest" form for you. We estimate this will take just 1 extra hour.

If you’re happy to proceed, let us know, and we’ll send over the invoice covering:
  • Zapier Integration (2h - completed)
  • Form Update (1h - new task)

Thanks!
Also just noticed, those pages you carried over, the form is broken: https://jilliandinkelcom.wolfiq.cloud/federation-queen-anne-interior-design-in-mosman/
Can the form please match the contact enquiry form?
Can you please make sure on all internal pages that it matches the contact form?

Hi Mikeila,

Happy to let you know that we’ve wrapped up the Zapier+Flodesk integration and everything is running smoothly.

Here is how the workflow is operating:
  • All project enquiries are now automatically added to Jillian Dinkel's Flodesk mailing list.

Feel free to test this from the staging site. Let us know if you run into any issues or have any questions.

Hi Mikeila,

Happy Monday!

Thanks for sending that workflow through. We’ll proceed with the one in the screenshot below—we anticipate it will take about 2 hours to complete.

I’ll keep you posted and let you know the moment the integration is completed in staging.
